Construct example financial data

Source: R/example_data.R
example_financial.Rd

Construct example financial data

Usage

example_financial(...)

Arguments

...

Passed to tibble().

Value

A tibble()

See also

Other example datasets: example_without_financial()

Examples

example_financial()
#> # A tibble: 1 × 10
#>   bank_id amount_total company_name emission_category grouping_emission
#>   <chr>          <dbl> <chr>        <chr>             <chr>            
#> 1 a                 10 b            medium            all              
#> # ℹ 5 more variables: profile_ranking <dbl>, transition_risk_score <dbl>,
#> #   equal_weight_finance <dbl>, worst_case_finance <dbl>,
#> #   best_case_finance <dbl>

# Add rows
example_financial(bank_id = 1:2)
#> # A tibble: 2 × 10
#>   bank_id amount_total company_name emission_category grouping_emission
#>     <int>        <dbl> <chr>        <chr>             <chr>            
#> 1       1           10 b            medium            all              
#> 2       2           10 b            medium            all              
#> # ℹ 5 more variables: profile_ranking <dbl>, transition_risk_score <dbl>,
#> #   equal_weight_finance <dbl>, worst_case_finance <dbl>,
#> #   best_case_finance <dbl>

# Add columns
example_financial(new = 1)
#> # A tibble: 1 × 11
#>     new bank_id amount_total company_name emission_category grouping_emission
#>   <dbl> <chr>          <dbl> <chr>        <chr>             <chr>            
#> 1     1 a                 10 b            medium            all              
#> # ℹ 5 more variables: profile_ranking <dbl>, transition_risk_score <dbl>,
#> #   equal_weight_finance <dbl>, worst_case_finance <dbl>,
#> #   best_case_finance <dbl>

# Remove columns
example_financial(bank_id = NULL)
#> # A tibble: 1 × 10
#>   bank_id amount_total company_name emission_category grouping_emission
#>   <chr>          <dbl> <chr>        <chr>             <chr>            
#> 1 a                 10 b            medium            all              
#> # ℹ 5 more variables: profile_ranking <dbl>, transition_risk_score <dbl>,
#> #   equal_weight_finance <dbl>, worst_case_finance <dbl>,
#> #   best_case_finance <dbl>

# Pass column names stored in vectors
id <- "bank_id"
example_financial(!!id := "c")
#> # A tibble: 1 × 10
#>   bank_id amount_total company_name emission_category grouping_emission
#>   <chr>          <dbl> <chr>        <chr>             <chr>            
#> 1 c                 10 b            medium            all              
#> # ℹ 5 more variables: profile_ranking <dbl>, transition_risk_score <dbl>,
#> #   equal_weight_finance <dbl>, worst_case_finance <dbl>,
#> #   best_case_finance <dbl>
